Hero.title: Empowering Parents
Hero.subtitle: We hold you to hold your child - with heart, mind & AI

Mission.statement:
We support parenting with evidence-based

strategies that optimize your children's emotional

management in everyday challenges

OurBrand.title: MEET HOLDING FAMILIES
OurBrand.paragraph1: We are dedicated to transform parenting by combining <bold>science, technology, and human warmth & expertise. We provide comprehensive support for parents</bold>, offering expert coaching and guidance <bold>to navigate the challenges of raising children.</bold>
OurBrand.paragraph2: Our goal is to <bold>make parenting more strategic, less stressful, and more empowering</bold> —strengthening family bonds and fostering emotional well-being from early childhood through the teenage years.
OurBrand.paragraph3: One of our main programs is <bold>Parente.AI, an AI-powered solution</bold> designed to help parents of children aged 2 to 12 <bold>manage behavioral challenges, enhance communication, and create a balanced</bold>, connected home environment. This 24/7 platform provides evidence-based strategies to optimize emotional management for both kids and parents, ensuring long-term success.

service1.title: HOLD ONE-ON-ONE
service1.subtitle: Personalized Parent Coaching
service1.description: A private space where we hold you with <bold>empathy and evidence-based tools</bold>, helping you navigate challenges with <bold>clarity and confidence</bold> — from tantrums to tough talks.

service2.title: HOLD TOGETHER
service2.subtitle: Group Coaching for Parents
service2.description: Connect with other parents in a <bold>supportive environment</bold>. Guided by a coach, you'll learn, share, and grow together — because you're <bold>not meant to do this alone</bold>.

service3.title: HOLD FROM THE START
service3.subtitle: Coaching for Expecting Parents & Baby's First Year
service3.description: From pregnancy to postpartum, we support you in building <bold>secure bonds and healthy routines</bold> from day one. <bold>Calm begins with you</bold> — and we're here to guide the way.

service4.title: HOLD WITH AI
service4.subtitle: Coaching Powered by ParenteAI
service4.description: We've partnered with ParenteAI to offer a <bold>hybrid model of support</bold> that combines <bold>24/7 AI guidance with the power of live coaching</bold>.

service5.title: HOLD THE FUTURE
service5.subtitle: Teen Prevention & Positive Behavior Programs
service5.description: <bold>Empower your child early</bold>. This program equips parents to prevent behavioral issues and build <bold>lasting emotional resilience</bold>.

footer.heading:
Make parenting a

more strategic, mindful,

and fulfilling journey
footer.benefit1: <bold>Strengthen Family Bonds -</bold> Foster deeper connections between parents and children through understanding and emotional support.
footer.benefit2: <bold>Empower Parents with 24/7 Tools & Knowledge -</bold> Provide practical strategies and expert-backed insights to navigate behavioral challenges with confidence.
footer.benefit3: <bold>Create a Balanced, Stress-Free Home -</bold> Help families manage daily routines, reduce stress and promote a positive home environment.

person1.name: Lic. Mariana Kerestezachi
person1.description: Co-Founder & Group Program Lead HOLDING FAMILIES. <bold>Licensed Psychologist from Argentina</bold>, now <bold>based in the U.S.</bold>, with <bold>17+ years of experience</bold> working with <bold>families, children with autism, and behavioral challenges.</bold> She founded and directed a hospital department specializing in diagnosis and treatment for children with disabilities and co-founded CPI, a private clinic for family and child therapy. She worked at Cayuga Centers Miami Florida (nonprofit organization from NY) for two years and a half, leading parenting workshops and group coaching.

education.heading: Education & Certifications:
education.item1: Licensed Psychologist (Universidad de Buenos Aires, Argentina) - Honors
education.item2: Master in Clinical Psychology (Universidad de Buenos Aires, Argentina)
education.item3: Certified in ADOS, ADI-R & Natural Nutrition (IATENA)
education.item4: Bachelor's in Psychology (USA), Certified Life Coach, Incredible Years Certified

person2.name: Lic. Paula Coloma
person2.description: Co-Founder & Owner HOLDING FAMILIES. <bold>Licensed Psychologist from Argentina, specialized in child and adolescent psychology, and a Certified Life Coach in the U.S.</bold> With <bold>10+ years of experience</bold>, she has worked in <bold>public and private healthcare and led interdisciplinary teams</bold>. She founded Elet Medical Center and has experience in healthcare management, including launching a private emergency service and leading a strategic health project in the Bahamas. Founder of Medkit Health, a healthcare company integrating physical and emotional well-being through a holistic approach.

education.heading: Education & Certifications:
education.item1: Licensed Psychologist (Universidad Barcelo, Buenos Aires) – Honors
